snippet: Even if you’re watching only to see Madonna, all you need to know about the big game is where the fairy dust falls.
abstract: New York Giants have recovered from a poor season start and will probably win the Super Bowl because they have figuratively been sprinkled with fairy dust.
lead_paragraph: Even if you’re watching only to see Madonna, all you need to know about the big game is where the fairy dust falls.

headline.seo: A Nonfan’s Guide to the Key to the Super Bowl
headline.main: No Kidding: Fairy Dust Can Swing Super Bowl
headline.print_headline: No Kidding: Fairy Dust Can Swing Super Bowl
